languages.text: "Капитан рапортует об устранении ксеноугрозы на борту судна. Неизвестно, из какого забытого отсека вылезла эта тварь, но она захватывала чужие тела, а ее взгляд причинял невыносимую боль. Несколько храбрецов погибли, пытаясь загнать мерзость в топливную камеру, но, в конце концов, ее сожгли, а пепел предали пустоте".

"The captain reports that a xenos threat was recently eliminated on board. It is unknown what forgotten compartment the creature had crawled out of, but it started taking over people's bodies, and its gaze inflicted unbearable pain. Several brave voidsmen died trying to drive the abomination into the fuel chamber before it was finally incinerated and its ashes consigned to the void."
languages.original_text: "Капитан рапортует об устранении ксеноугрозы на борту судна. Неизвестно, из какого забытого отсека вылезла эта тварь, но она захватывала чужие тела, а ее взгляд причинял невыносимую боль. Несколько храбрецов погибли, пытаясь загнать мерзость в топливную камеру, но, в конце концов, ее сожгли, а пепел предали пустоте".

It is unknown what forgotten compartment the creature had crawled out of, but it started taking over people's bodies and its gaze inflicted unbearable pain. Several brave voidsmen died trying to drive the abomination into the fuel chamber before it was finally incinerated and its ashes consigned to the void."

It is unknown what forgotten compartment the creature had crawled out of, but it started taking over people's bodies, and its gaze inflicted unbearable pain. Several brave voidsmen died trying to drive the abomination into the fuel chamber before it was finally incinerated and its ashes consigned to the void."

languages.text: 「船長の報告によると、最近、船内で異種族の脅威が排除されました。その生物がどの忘れられた区画から這い出てきたのかは不明ですが、人々の身体を乗っ取り始め、その視線は耐え難い痛みを与えました。数人の勇敢なヴォイズマンがその化け物を燃料室へ追い込み、最終的に焼却し、灰を虚空へと投じました」
languages.original_text: "The captain reports that a xenos threat was recently eliminated on board. It is unknown what forgotten compartment the creature had crawled out of, but it started taking over people's bodies, and its gaze inflicted unbearable pain. Several brave voidsmen died trying to drive the abomination into the fuel chamber before it was finally incinerated and its ashes consigned to the void."

traits.locale_text: 「船長の報告によると、最近、船内で異種族の脅威が排除されました。その生物がどの忘れられた区画から這い出てきたのかは不明ですが、人々の身体を乗っ取り始め、その視線は耐え難い痛みを与えました。数人の勇敢なヴォイズマンがその化け物を燃料室へ追い込み、最終的に焼却し、灰を虚空へと投じました」

languages.text: "Kaptan, kısa süre önce gemide bir zeno tehdidinin ortadan kaldırıldığını bildirdi. Yaratığın hangi unutulmuş bölmeden çıktığı bilinmese de insanların bedenlerini ele geçirmeye başlamış, dayanılmaz acılara sebep olmuş. Birkaç cesur uçsuz eri, bu iğrenç yaratığı yakıt odasına sokmaya çalışırken can vermiş ama en sonunda yakıp küllerini boşluğa savurmayı başarmışlar."
languages.original_text: "The captain reports that a xenos threat was recently eliminated on board. It is unknown what forgotten compartment the creature had crawled out of, but it started taking over people's bodies, and its gaze inflicted unbearable pain. Several brave voidsmen died trying to drive the abomination into the fuel chamber before it was finally incinerated and its ashes consigned to the void."

traits.locale_text: "Kaptan, kısa süre önce gemide bir zeno tehdidinin ortadan kaldırıldığını bildirdi. Yaratığın hangi unutulmuş bölmeden çıktığı bilinmese de insanların bedenlerini ele geçirmeye başlamış, dayanılmaz acılara sebep olmuş. Birkaç cesur uçsuz eri, bu iğrenç yaratığı yakıt odasına sokmaya çalışırken can vermiş ama en sonunda yakıp küllerini boşluğa savurmayı başarmışlar."

languages.text: «El capitán informa de que hace poco se eliminó una amenaza xenos a bordo no hace mucho. No se sabe de qué compartimento olvidado había salido la criatura, pero empezó a apoderarse de los cuerpos de la gente y su mirada infligía un dolor atroz. Varios valientes infantes del vacío dieron sus vidas para conducir a la abominación a la cámara de combustible, donde fue incinerada y sus cenizas arrojadas al vacío».
languages.original_text: "The captain reports that a xenos threat was recently eliminated on board. It is unknown what forgotten compartment the creature had crawled out of, but it started taking over people's bodies, and its gaze inflicted unbearable pain. Several brave voidsmen died trying to drive the abomination into the fuel chamber before it was finally incinerated and its ashes consigned to the void."

traits.locale_text: «El capitán informa de que hace poco se eliminó una amenaza xenos a bordo no hace mucho. No se sabe de qué compartimento olvidado había salido la criatura, pero empezó a apoderarse de los cuerpos de la gente y su mirada infligía un dolor atroz. Varios valientes infantes del vacío dieron sus vidas para conducir a la abominación a la cámara de combustible, donde fue incinerada y sus cenizas arrojadas al vacío».

languages.text: “无心号的舰长报告说，船员们最近消灭了一只异形。那只怪物究竟是从哪个被人遗忘的船舱里爬出来的，目前还没弄清楚。不过，怪物出现之后，便不断占据船员的身体，它的凝视还会给人带来难以忍受的痛楚。到最后，几位勇敢的船员牺牲了性命，将这只怪物赶进了燃料室。怪物被彻底烧成了灰烬，洒向虚空之中。”
languages.original_text: "The captain reports that a xenos threat was recently eliminated on board. It is unknown what forgotten compartment the creature had crawled out of, but it started taking over people's bodies, and its gaze inflicted unbearable pain. Several brave voidsmen died trying to drive the abomination into the fuel chamber before it was finally incinerated and its ashes consigned to the void."

traits.locale_text: “无心号的舰长报告说，船员们最近消灭了一只异形。那只怪物究竟是从哪个被人遗忘的船舱里爬出来的，目前还没弄清楚。不过，怪物出现之后，便不断占据船员的身体，它的凝视还会给人带来难以忍受的痛楚。到最后，几位勇敢的船员牺牲了性命，将这只怪物赶进了燃料室。怪物被彻底烧成了灰烬，洒向虚空之中。”

languages.text: "Der Captain berichtet, dass kürzlich ein Xenos an Bord eliminiert wurde. Niemand weiß, aus welchem vergessenen Modul die Kreatur gekrochen war, aber sie fing an, die Körper anderer Personen zu übernehmen und ihr Blick löste unerträgliche Schmerzen aus. Mehrere tapfere Raumfahrer starben beim Versuch, die Abscheulichkeit in die Treibstoffkammer zu treiben, bis sie schließlich verbrannte und ihre Asche der Leere übergeben wurde."
languages.original_text: "The captain reports that a xenos threat was recently eliminated on board. It is unknown what forgotten compartment the creature had crawled out of, but it started taking over people's bodies, and its gaze inflicted unbearable pain. Several brave voidsmen died trying to drive the abomination into the fuel chamber before it was finally incinerated and its ashes consigned to the void."

traits.locale_text: "Der Captain berichtet, dass kürzlich ein Xenos an Bord eliminiert wurde. Niemand weiß, aus welchem vergessenen Modul die Kreatur gekrochen war, aber sie fing an, die Körper anderer Personen zu übernehmen und ihr Blick löste unerträgliche Schmerzen aus. Mehrere tapfere Raumfahrer starben beim Versuch, die Abscheulichkeit in die Treibstoffkammer zu treiben, bis sie schließlich verbrannte und ihre Asche der Leere übergeben wurde."

languages.text: « Le capitaine signale qu'une menace xénos qui se trouvait à bord du vaisseau a été récemment éliminée. On ne sait pas dans quel compartiment oublié il pouvait bien se dissimuler, mais il avait commencé à s'emparer du corps de ses victimes et son simple regard infligeait de terribles douleurs. Plusieurs cosmomarins se sont sacrifiés pour attirer l'abomination dans le réservoir de carburant afin de l'incinérer et d'expulser ses cendres dans le vide. »
languages.original_text: "The captain reports that a xenos threat was recently eliminated on board. It is unknown what forgotten compartment the creature had crawled out of, but it started taking over people's bodies, and its gaze inflicted unbearable pain. Several brave voidsmen died trying to drive the abomination into the fuel chamber before it was finally incinerated and its ashes consigned to the void."

traits.locale_text: « Le capitaine signale qu'une menace xénos qui se trouvait à bord du vaisseau a été récemment éliminée. On ne sait pas dans quel compartiment oublié il pouvait bien se dissimuler, mais il avait commencé à s'emparer du corps de ses victimes et son simple regard infligeait de terribles douleurs. Plusieurs cosmomarins se sont sacrifiés pour attirer l'abomination dans le réservoir de carburant afin de l'incinérer et d'expulser ses cendres dans le vide. »
